articles.author: Jorge Liboreiro
articles.title: Corruption scandal: MEPs vote to suspend Qatar access to EU Parliament and halt related legislation - Euronews
articles.description: In reaction to the widening corruption scandal, the European Parliament decided to suspend all pending legislation involving Qatar. #EuropeNews
articles.content: Members of the European Parliament voted on Thursday to suspend access to the hemicycle's premises to Qatari representatives as the Gulf country is suspected of having offered "large sums of money" a… [+3909 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: Russian oil sold to India below price cap in buyers' market - Reuters
articles.description: Russia's flagship Urals crude has been sold at deeper discounts this month following a European ban on Russian oil imports, and dominant buyer India has bought barrels at well below a $60 price cap agreed by the West, four market sources said.
articles.content: NEW DELHI, Dec 14 (Reuters) - Russia's flagship Urals crude has been sold at deeper discounts this month following a European ban on Russian oil imports, and dominant buyer India has bought barrels a… [+3449 chars]

articles.author: Klaus Feldmann, PhD, VP, Oncology for Europe and Canada at MSD
articles.title: Future of cancer care: the earlier, the better - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Scientific advancements in early diagnosis and treatment have brought us closer than ever to a better future for cancer care. Here’s how — and why acting early is so essential.
articles.content: We often see gloomy headlines about cancer remaining the second-leading cause of death globally. It accounted for almost 1.3 million deaths in the EU in 2020.1 Yet, we often forget that the science t… [+4847 chars]
